actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on Benzoic acid, 4-{{(2,5-dichlorophenyl)amino}carbonyl}-2-{{2-hydroxy-3-{{(2-methoxyphenyl)amino}carbonyl}-1-naphthalenyl}-,methyl ester.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on benzoic acid, 4- (((2,5-dichlorophenyl) amino) carbonyl)-2-((2-hydroxy-3-(((2- methoxyphenyl) amino) carbonyl)-1-naphthalenyl)-, methyl ester.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on Benzoic acid, 4-{{(2,5-dichlorophenyl)amino}carbonyl}-2-{{2-hydroxy-3-{{(2-methoxyphenyl)amino}carbonyl}-1-naphthalenyl}-,methyl ester.
